description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育理論領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends, theories, and research in educational theory. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 本課程介紹複合材料的原理，包括複合材料的高分子化學、複合材料的加工方法、複合材料的力學分析與設計、以及複合材料在高科技上的應用。加工方法包括真空袋成型法、壓力釜成形法、樹脂移送成型、編織法、纏繞成形法、拉擠成型法、模壓法…等，本課程詳述這些加工方法的原理及應用，同時介紹力學分析及設計，應力和應變之關係，複材之彎曲、靜態和動態之強度、脫層、耐久性、及以力學觀點設計複合材料，最後討論複合材料如何應用於高科技及民生工業上。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the principle and potential application of composite materials. It includes polymer chemistry, design and analysis of composite, and processing methods. The composite processings include autoclaves,vacuum vags, resin transform molding, braiding, filament winding, pultrusions, sheet molding compound,…etc. The principles and application of the methods will be elucidated. The analysis and design, strain-stress relationships, extension and bending, static and dynamic strengths, and delamination, will also be discussed. Finally, the potential application of the composite in high-tech industries will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Application of  Matlab and toolkit

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 同步工程課程提供學生兩方面學習的主題：(1)建構同步產品與製程的方法與組織 (2)應用前法設計與發展出全生命產品整合系統。整個課程將涵蓋下列子題：(1)製造競爭力(2)全生命週期管理(3)在造工程(4)同步工作團隊(5)系統工程(6)資訊塑模(7)產品實現流程剖析等多項子
description.en: The course of Concurrent Engineering provides two major themes. The first theme is establishing a concurrent product and process methodology. The second theme is applying this methodology to design and develop the total product integrated system. In the following key topics are discussed in the whole semester: (1) manufacturing Competitiveness (2) life-cycle management (3) process reengineering (4) Concurrent work-groups (5) system engineering (6) information modeling (7) product realization process.

description.zh: 每週六小時二學分的專業必修課，旨在訓練碩一新生能在短時間內學習各種生物科技必須且基本的實驗技術並能有通盤的了解。課程的安排除了在生物科技所的教授實驗室中學習外，也將安排學生至中央研究院、國立臺灣大學、長庚大學及醫院、國防醫學大學及業界生物科技公司學習先進的生物科技的實驗方法和技術。
description.en: This course will provide students to learn essential and basic methods and experiments in biotechnology. The students must learn the methods and experiments in laboratories of the professors in Institute of Biotechnology, Academia Sinica, National Taiwan University, Chang Gung University, National Defense University and biotech companies.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹生物催化劑-酵素-之基礎知識。內容包括酵素之成份、特性、應用及調製。酵素能催化加速反應速度，由於降低活化能。但不能改變化平衡。酵素泛用於工業上，特別在醫藥上有很重要的用途。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of biocatalysts, including its compositions, characteristics, application, and their preparation. Enzymes accelerate the rates of reactions, by decreasing activation energy, however, they does not change chemical equilibrium. Enzymes are widely used in industry and have significant medical application.

description.zh: 分子生物學為現代生物科技尤其是基因工程的基礎學問。課程內容深入探討生物的四大類分子： DNA 及 RNA，蛋白質，脂質，以及醣類分子。並且詳細探討現代分子生物學之中心思想，包含DNA 複製、轉錄、轉譯等。
description.en: Molecular biology is the fundamental of modern biotechnology, especially genetic engineering. Students learn what are DNA, RNA, protein, lipid, and carbohydrate and how do they work in this course. The central dogma of modern molecular biology, including DNA replication, transcription, and translation, is the major topic of this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於強化並提昇學生在中、英文學術與專業論文寫作上的能力與表達。內容包括：1.介紹工程研究的本質及科學家的思考邏輯；2.相關文獻資料的選用與閱讀；3.研究主題的寫作計畫與大綱；4.論文格式、寫作各項要求、段落銜接、病句分析及文法修辭等；5.好文章的組成要素，譬如是否精確報導事實？如何進一步討論數據測量的是非、新舊、優劣？以及是否解決問題的重點等？6.研究計畫書及論文的評審與出版；7.其他注意事項，含如何運用電腦媒體及網路製作圖表、簡報、履歷表、求職信、推薦函以及正確且合理使用他人的著作資料等。
description.en: 1.Nature of engineering research, thinking and logic of scientists.2.Reading and understanding literature and problems in research.3.Planning process and preliminary outlines before a scientific writing.4.Style, format, writing requirements, paragraph transition, sentence coherence, and grammar rhetoric for a scientific paper.5.Key elements of a fine paper, i.e. being a precise report of facts, being a concise interpretation of measured data and their comparisons and analysis, and being a new finding or solution for a research problem.6.Submission, reviewing and publication of research proposals and papers.7.Tips on writing with the aid of computer tools and websites include the making of tables, graphs, oral presentations, resumes, and placement letters.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

description.zh: 縱覽教育經濟學理論基礎，研習教育經濟研究方法論，主題探討包含:台灣經濟成功的要件，經濟政策與發展軌跡及高科技的挑戰，重要論點在於如何結合技職教育融入台灣新興產業要求。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the economics of education. Topics include elements of success economic policies, economic policies, economic development, and challenges of hi-tech era in Taiwan, and discussion of issues on what elements impact Taiwan's economic development and how to combine the technical-vocational education with the development of Taiwan's new industry.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程發展的學理，包括技職教育課程的意義﹑課程發展的基本原理及理論基礎，進而瞭解技職教育的類型及其發展模式，考量課程實施的各項條件，具備課程評鑑的觀念，最後能掌握技職教育課程的發展動向，同時對現行技職教育課程發展的實務問題，提出解決對策。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程在導引學生了解教師專業的相關概念與理論，協助學生探究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，以及教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略。
description.en: This course is to guide students to understand the relevant concepts and theories on teacher professionals；to explore the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria；to investigate  the successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

name.en: Field Test Environment Management and Safety

description.zh: 探討技職學校實習工場規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等管理事項，以及實習工場安全防護設施與措施，以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: Exploring the best practice of management and safety for field test environment is the purpose of this course.

name.en: Instructional Strategies for Technical- Vocational Education

description.zh: 身為一名專業教師，應對教學策略有深刻的瞭解，方能詳細考慮各項條件﹑採取適切的教學策略，提昇教學的成效。本課程之開設，即在使學習者熟悉教學策略的意義﹑教學策略的類型，提昇教學相關理念，並進一步應用所學，反思個人的教學，促進教學理論與教學實踐間的連結。
description.en: The course is designed to make the graduate understand the basic concept of instruction, to realize the various strategies for instruction in technical-vocational education, and to know how to apply and evaluate the strategies.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 本課程內容以個體、團體與組織三層次為經，以行為基礎、激勵理論、個體決策、團體行為、團體決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題為緯，探討組織相關之理論及管理實務。
description.en: The curriculum discusses the theory and practice of organization management in terms of the horizontal development of the individual, group, and organization and the vertical development of the related issue on behavior foundation, encouragement theory, individual decision, group behavior, group decision, communication theory, leadership, power and politics, leadership, organization design, organization culture, organization change and development.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之設計法及統計分析法，其中包括：單因子實驗 ，完全區集設計 ，不完全區集設計 ，多因子實驗 ，部份因子實驗 ，變異數分析 ，迴歸分析 ， 最佳化
description.en: Basic ideas of experimental design with applications; completely randomized design, randomized block design, estimation and tests, analysis of covariance for designed experiments; factorial experiments, incomplete block designs in general; determination of optimum factor combinations; basic ideas of optimal design.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1) 應用量子力學：量子力學的基本結構，簡單量子系統，原子、分子及晶體之電子結構與能階，量子躍遷，量子統計，傳輸現象、量子雜訊，晶體能帶結構，量子光學，多體量子系統。(2)奈米材料學：奈米材料之基本性質，奈米材料特殊之物性，奈米材料擴散及燒結特性，特殊奈米材料、CNT製程與應用。(3)奈米顆粒材料：奈米顆粒材料特性，奈米顆粒材料之製程，奈米顆粒材料之檢測分析技術，奈米顆粒材料之光電應用，奈米顆粒材料之熱流應用，奈米顆粒材料之生化應用，奈米顆粒材料專題報告。
description.en: (1) Applied quantum mechanics: Basic approach, simple quantum systems, time dependent quantum phenomena, statistical physics, transport phenomena, quantum  optics,  many-body effects.(2) Nano materials: Fundamental properties of material special physical properties diffusion and sintering characteristics, carbon nano tube related fabrication process and application.(3) Nanoparticles Technology: Property of nano particles fabrication, measuring analysis, some applications related with optoelectronics fluid, thermal, and biochemistry project.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 1.概論 2.建築載重及結構反應 3.空間整合與結構系統 4.建築常用之結構系統,含形態成用系統,向量作用系統,面作用系統及體積作用等5.垂直結構系統 6.水平結構系統 7.高樓結構系統 8.基礎結構系統 9.結構系統與建造
description.en: 1.Course introduction 2.Structural loading and structural behaviors 3.Space integration and structural system 4.Popular structural systems 5.Vertical structural system 6.Horizontal structural system 7.High rise building structural system 8.Foundation structual system 9.Structural system and construction

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。

description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

name.zh: 科技產業趨勢分析專案研究
name.en: Project Research of Industry Trend Analysis in High Technolo

description.zh: 1.運用Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環訊息2.採用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具探究相關產業的內容與現況3.	相關產業趨勢專案製作4.相關產業趨勢專案之實驗與評鑑
description.en: 1. It applies the circulate message of prosperity cycle on Crystal Cycle. 2. It explores contents and situations about relating property by Porter's five force analysis, SWOT analysis, and Diamond analysis.3. It manufactures the Project in relating property.4. It practices and criticizes the Project in relating property.

name.zh: 平面顯示器設計與生產技術
name.en: Design and Manufacturing Technology of Flat Panel Display

description.zh: 本課程將介紹TFT液晶顯示器的相關技術，包含液晶的物理特性，光學特性，複晶矽TFT陣列與驅動電路設計，顯示器之視覺與色彩，TFT-LCD之製造流程與設備,及相關的新興技術等。
description.en: The course introduces the basic technologies related to TFT-LCD. It will cover LCD physics and optical properties, LPTS and array design, LCD driving, vision and color in display and TFT processing and equipment etc.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 說明歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由歷史建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣歷史建築修復與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

name.zh: 永續健康都市專題討論
name.en: The Health Issues in a Sustainable City

description.zh: 都市規劃之議題由土地使用機能滿足、都市景觀優美，進而要求都市的生態永續性；然而更進一步的都市規劃目標更在確保都市居民的健康議題。本課程在研討都市規劃技術上如何考量諸如：對市民呼吸道健康之影響鉅大的都市落塵在社區及校園狀況、都市供電系統產生非游離輻射分佈探討、都市噪音在社區分佈影響、社區室內外有害微生物分佈影響分析等，都市空間規劃上的健康問題探討及改善。
description.en: The main issue of urban planning of land use has shifted in the past decades to landscaping issues and then to urban sustainability. Jet recently the health issues in urban planning becomes more important after the incidents of pollution and epidemic.The purpose of this seminar is, how could health issues and techniques be considered and applied in practical urban planning, such as: PM10 aerosol distribution in communities and school districts, magnetic fields caused by power facilities, the noise effect on urban areas, the effect of microorganism in communities indoors and outdoors etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計
description.en: The overall purpose of Non-electric Power Air Cond. Energy Saving Technology: 1.The Concept of Absorption Heat pump tech. 2.Fuel Cell System integration with Cogen. Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式， Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 由於世界各國對自來水水質標準逐漸提高，因此，自來水高級處理已變成目前國際上飲用水研究之主要趨勢。此外在台灣，由於河川受污水下水道普及率低及工業污染之影響下，原水水質長久不佳。傳統處理程序已無法因應消費者之需求，高雄水質不佳即是最好例子。因此，本課程之重點嘉集中高級自來水之處理程序，如薄膜逆滲透、超過濾、為過濾、臭氧等高級氧化程序與有機物吸附等處理程序。
description.en: Because of the tightened regulation enacted by many countries, advanced drinking water treatment technology has been the research focus all around the world. In addition, in Taiwan, water resource, including surface and ground water, are seriously polluted due to industrial discharge and low sewerage system connection ratio. Traditional treatment processes, such as coagulation, sedimentation, filtration, are not enough for water purification for these deterioraated raw water gualities. Therefoore, this class will offer the opportunity to improve the knowledge for advanced drinking water treatment technology, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ozone disinfection, GAC adsorption, and me.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

name.en: Landscape Design Method of Regional Approach

description.zh: 景觀，從比較完整的角度來看，既是人文的，也是自然的整體表現。現代化的普及知識和普同技術帶來對自然環境的衝擊和地區景觀特色的趨同，已經使得從事景觀設計專業警覺到應該反省當前景觀設計方法和表達的適當性。自從 1960年代以來被景觀建築專業奉為圭鎳的自然環境導向的設計方法已經開始遭到質疑。本課程從地域觀點講述有關的主張與理論；尤其以台灣地區為對象探討特定地區課題，以及依此理念所發展出的這一套設計理論與方法。此一課程的設計方法將可提供有興趣選擇環境設計方向論文的同學可能的觀念性架構。    1.  當代台灣景觀設計思潮與問題    2.  地域性環境規畫設計理論    3.  地域性景觀設計的內涵    4.  地域性景觀設計方法    5.  地域性景觀設計的實務
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below;    1.  Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design     2.  Rationale of the regional planning and design    3.  The body of regional design in landscape    4.  Method of regional approach to landscape design    5.  The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh: 邀請各界人士到系演講，針對學術專題研究成果進行研討，並就管理技術與發展趨勢以及成功個案等介紹不同行業的營運方式及競爭力分析。
description.en: Scholars and experts will be invited to make lectures; each lecture will focus on special attribution in the field which speaker involved.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題
description.en: The subject is hereby divided into six parts (1) discussing the past, present and future from standpoint of the chronicle of urban development; (2) exploring the urban pattern and design theory be referring to on-going urban development; (3) inquiring into the theory of formation, configuration and generation and urban space; (4) searching the social process, technical process and creation process through the formation of urban space; (5) from the virtual, natural and cultural design to review the proper layout of land use, open space, building pattern and volume, flow dynamic line, parking lot, road, furniture and support for citizen activity; (6) technically reviewing the main urban plan, detail plan, overall review of urban plan, urban renewal, land use, zone control and urban landscape.

description.zh: 模矩配合是針對建築生產過程所制訂的共同尺度規則，以作為規畫設計製造之間資訊交流的工具，以及空間共用的各種建築系統之間定位協調的工具。本課程將由淺而深的從基本模矩概念，逐步介紹模矩配合的理論與操作方法，進而由國內外應用實例檢討模矩配合制度的發展與推動。課程內容包括： 模矩基本介紹 模矩配合理論 操作準則 應用實例
description.en: Modular Coordination is an agreed rule of dimension to smooth the process of building production. With this tool we can exchange data between parties of planning, design, and manufacture, as well as coordinate positions with building systems which sharing a space. We will study the basic theory, current applications and future trend of MC in this course. It contents Introduction of Module Theory of Modular Coordination Principles of conduction Cases of application.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
先修課程：負責教授同意。1.晶體結構與晶體缺陷 2.光電材料的種類 3.材料的光電特性 4.發光元件 5.檢光元件 6.各種光耦合器
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and defects 2.Optoelectronic aterials3.Optoelectronic 4.Light-emitting devices 5.Properties of materials 6.Optical couplers

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 工業機器人概論，基礎理論分析：運動學，動力學，控制等，機器人之設計程序，機器人在彈性裝配與製造系統之應用分析與系統設計，智慧型機器人，個案研究等 。
description.en: Introduction to industrial robot, Fundamental theory of robot: kinematics, dynamics, and control etc., Robot design process, Application to flexible assembly and manufacturing system, Introduction to intelligent robot, Case study, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以講授計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到幾種目前廣泛使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器用的路由協定為主。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer.  Popular physical layer medias are discussed first.  Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion.  Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.zh: 流行辦公家具與空間設計研究
name.en: Special Topics in Contemporary Office Space and Furniture Re

description.zh: 從現代工作之型態去探討人、空間與家具之關係，並隨材料科技和加工技術的進步，研究現代辦公家具的趨勢及設計方向。
description.en: A general study of design trend of contemporary office furniture by examining modern work types and organization structures respectively. This course intends to utilize material improvement, new manufacturing technology and ergonomics studies to study the trends and directions of office space and furniture design.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

name.en: Special Topics of Universal Design in Furniture

description.zh: 全適化設計在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足每一個使用者的需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認全適化設計思維方法與實務，本課程著重於全適化設計理論在家具設計上的應用。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

description.en: Advanced Bridge Engineering 1.Analysis of Structures of Bridge2.Design of RC-Bridges3.Explanation of Specifications

description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討用於單一時點資料和時間序列型資料的統計預測方法，預測技術涵蓋迴歸分析、時間序列迴歸、分解方法、指數平滑法、和Box-Jenkins 法。
description.en: This course is to study statistical forecasting methods for cross-sectional data and time series data. The quantitative forecasting techniques include regression analysis, time series regression, decomposition method, exponential smoothing and Box-Jenkins method.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合資訊相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質與提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之基礎資訊技術，透過實際資訊系統之建置，使學生具備基礎製造資訊系統設計之能力。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive, the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore, the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology about manufacturing information systems. Students can learn the technology for data collection and application program design.

description.zh: 於工業工程與管理之研究領域中，圖形辨識為一重要之工具，故於本課程中藉由理論和實作之配合，且加入相關主題之專題報告，以增加學生對圖形辨識之理解和應用，課程之內容包含：統計型圖形辨識、降維法、群聚法、類神經辨識法、及其運用。
description.en: Pattern recognition is an important tool in the area of industrial engineering and management.  The purpose of this course is to study the theory and applications in the area of pattern recognition.  Incorporating the lecture and three projects (self-learning), we let student practice the commonly used algorithms of pattern recognition.  The content includes the following subjects: statistical pattern recognition, dimensionality reduction, clustering, and neural network approaches and their applications.

description.zh: 本課程介紹光的散射效應、非共振光的理論處理方式、拉曼散射與雷利散射的古典理論與量子力學理論、拉曼光譜實驗的程序介紹，以及拉曼光譜於材料及資源工程領域的各項應用。
description.en: Introduction to the following topics: 1.Survey of light scattering phenomena, 2. Theoretical treatments of incoherent light scattering, 3. Classical theory of Rayleigh and Raman scattering, 4.Quantum mechanical theory of Rayleigh and Raman scattering, 5. Experimental procedures, 6.Examples of the application of Raman Spectroscopy on Materials and Mineral Resources Engineering

description.en: 1.Introduction to Wideband Wireless Communication System2.Wideband Channel Characterization 3.Ststem Analysis Fundamentals 4.The UTRA Physical Layer Design 5.The UTRA Transmission System 6.Radio Resource Management 7.CDMA2000 8.OFDM

description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對電子化企業經營與管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.	商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究

Business reengineering4.Enterprise resource planning5.Small enterprise e-business management6.	Channel e-business7.Supply chain management8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10.	Case Study

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 雖然類神經網路及模糊邏輯均可適當作為控制用，但前者具有容錯、平行處理及學習的特性，而後者具有語言描述及邏輯控制的特性，因此這兩者具有互補效果。若能將此二者妥善整合，將有助於解決複雜系統的控制問題。近年來如何充分利用類神經網路與模糊系統的好處（例如系統的強健性、資訊分散式表示法、容易處理不確定感測器數據等），並據此設計一控制系統，這方面的需求日益迫切。這門課在歐美先進國家很熱門，國內雖有一些大學，開始開授類神經網路，以及模糊系統的課程，但大都單獨開授，僅有少數將此二者予以整合。有鑑於此，乃選擇開授「類神經模糊控制及其應用」。授課對象以研究生為主，時間為一學期。本課程開授的目的為介紹類神經網路與模糊控制之基本理論、重要現象、分析方法與工具、及部份應用實例。另外也將介紹相關研究課題之發展、研究近況與待探討的問題。規劃的課程大綱如下：類神經網路簡介、前饋網路及監督式學習、非監督式學習網路、迴授型類神經網路、類神經網路之應用、模糊集合概念、模糊關係、模糊邏輯及近似推理、模糊邏輯控制系統及類神經模糊控制器。

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.
